item.title: Network Engineer
item.dc:creator: adminadmin
item.description: WE’RE HIRING! Network Engineer Roles and Responsibilities: Installation and deployment of networking hardware and software (e.g: switch, router, firewall, wireless controller and access point) Configuration network devices to meet the customer requirements and solution architecture Capable of analyse network performance to ensure optimal functionality and resolving network issues through effective troubleshooting techniques Capable for [...]
item.content:encoded:
WE’RE HIRING!
Network Engineer

Roles and Responsibilities:

  • Installation and deployment of networking hardware and software (e.g: switch, router, firewall, wireless controller and access point)
  • Configuration network devices to meet the customer requirements and solution architecture
  • Capable of analyse network performance to ensure optimal functionality and resolving network issues through effective troubleshooting techniques
  • Capable for routine maintenance network devices to ensure performance, security and stability
  • Capable for update/upgrade firmware & software network devices to the stable version
  • Prepare documentation of installation, troubleshooting report (corrective maintenance), daily or monthly report (preventive maintenance)

Qualification:

  • In-depth understanding of network diagnosis layer by layer (7 Layer OSI Model “Open Systems Interconnection Model”)
  • Minimum 1 year experience as network engineer
  • Good problem solving and analytical skill
  • Familiar with network devices (switch / router / access point from various brand)
  • Familiar with network diagnostic tools
  • Having technical certification related to networking (CCNA, CCNP, CompTIA Network+, HCIA) is a plus
  • Willing to travel
  • Contractual basis

Submit your CV to recruitment@clarus-it.co.id or apply through https://bit.ly/applyjobatclarusit

item.title: Presales
item.dc:creator: adminadmin
item.description: WE’RE HIRING! Presales Roles and Responsibilities: Identification customer requirement and need analysis Solution Design align with customer needs and ensure the design meets quality, scalability, security, and compability with customer existing system Coordinate and communicate with all stakeholders, which consists of Internal Team (Sales & Technical Team), Principal, Distributor and Customer Create documentation of [...]
item.content:encoded:
WE’RE HIRING!
Presales

Roles and Responsibilities:

  • Identification customer requirement and need analysis
  • Solution Design align with customer needs and ensure the design meets quality, scalability, security, and compability with customer existing system
  • Coordinate and communicate with all stakeholders, which consists of Internal Team (Sales & Technical Team), Principal, Distributor and Customer
  • Create documentation of Solution Proposal / Tender and Solution Presentation
  • Present solution to customer
  • Stay up-to-date with the latest technology trends to ensure the solution design and solution transfer knowledge delivered well to customer

Qualification:

  • Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or related field
  • Minimum 3 years of working experience in field of solution architecture
  • Having technical certification related to security, networking, cloud, servers, and storage is a plus
  • In-depth understanding of IT Architecture, Sizing Solution, Integration technologies (Server, Storage, Cloud, Backup & Replication, Network, Security)
  • Strong communication skills to bridge business and technical capability
  • Excellent presentation skill
  • Self-driven and have a passion to make things work
  • Team player who understands that the strength of the team is the sum of all individual
  • Meticulous and strong in execution of directives from the management team
  • Willing to travel
  • Contractual basis

Submit your CV to recruitment@clarus-it.co.id or apply through https://bit.ly/applyjobatclarusit

item.title: Account Manager
item.dc:creator: adminadmin
item.description: WE’RE HIRING! Account Manager Roles and Responsibilities: Responsible for sales activity for IT Solutions Build relationship with new customer and/or maintain relationship with existing customer Finding, creating opportunity, develop prospective leads to be qualified opportunities, negotiating, monitoring contract implementation and customer satisfaction Offer solution to customers by study and evaluate customers problem Maintain project funnel [...]
item.content:encoded:
WE’RE HIRING!
Account Manager

Roles and Responsibilities:

  • Responsible for sales activity for IT Solutions
  • Build relationship with new customer and/or maintain relationship with existing customer
  • Finding, creating opportunity, develop prospective leads to be qualified opportunities, negotiating, monitoring contract implementation and customer satisfaction
  • Offer solution to customers by study and evaluate customers problem
  • Maintain project funnel in project portfolio system
  • Managing internal coordination among technical, project management, product specialist and the customer

Qualification:

  • Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Telecommunication, Industrial, Marketing or related field
  • Familiar with IT industry and/or essential sales skill
  • Good attitude, interpersonal and negotiation skill
  • Able to work under pressure
  • Able to operate computer / laptop, Ms. Office and e-mail
  • Willing to travel
  • Contractual basis

Submit your CV to recruitment@clarus-it.co.id or apply through https://bit.ly/applyjobatclarusit

item.content:encoded:
After a day filled with tech challenges and innovations, whatâ€™s better than hitting the court for a fun friendly badminton match?

At PT Clarus Innovace Teknologi, we know that great teamwork doesnâ€™t just happen in meetingsâ€”itâ€™s also built in moments of laughter, friendly rivalry, and unforgettable memories. Sports Day gave everyone a chance to unwind, recharge, and strengthen the connections that drive our collaboration.

Itâ€™s not just about the game; itâ€™s about the team spirit that makes every day at Clarus a little brighter. Hereâ€™s to recharging and smashing it, on and off the court!

item.content:encoded:
True connection isnâ€™t just formed in the digital world, but in the shared moments we create. At PT Clarus Innovace Teknologiâ€™s 2022 Buka Bersama, we strengthened our bonds in the midst of our tech innovation journey. This gathering is more than just breaking fastâ€”itâ€™s a time to reflect on the power of unity that drives us to create impactful solutions and cutting-edge technologies. A strong, connected team builds the best innovations.Â 

May this spirit continue to fuel our strides toward a more advanced and meaningful future in technology.

We ventured into rugged terrains, embraced the thrill of off-roading, and enjoyed the beautiful natural setting. Â It was a chance to connect with colleagues in a new and exciting [...]
item.content:encoded:
2020 Company Gathering at Offroad Bandung was an unforgettable experience!Â  A weekend full of adventure, team bonding, and a much-needed escape from the usual office routine. We ventured into rugged terrains, embraced the thrill of off-roading, and enjoyed the beautiful natural setting.

Â It was a chance to connect with colleagues in a new and exciting environment, strengthening our team bonds in a refreshing way. A perfect break that left us feeling more united and energized!
